title: Profile Storage Schema
description: A schema for storing profiles of organizations

id.description: A unique identifier for the profile

website.description: The URL of the organization's website

tag.description: A descriptive tag for the profile

heroFileId.description: The unique identifier of the image file used as the profile's hero image

logoFileId.description: The unique identifier of the image file used as the profile's logo

description.description: A brief description of the profile

descriptionFileId.description: The unique identifier of the audio file used as a description of the profile

budget.description: The programming budget of the organization
